content_parts.content: The required setup files for tax management for South Africa in sales and purchase documents are available.

A section dedicated to Sage Service Fabric is available on the Option management page. It consists of two blocks: Configuration and Tax ID validation. You can activate or deactivate Sage Service Fabric options such as tax ID controls from this section.

content_parts.content: You can upload companies, entity use codes, and tax codes directly from Avalara using the data load functions provided on the Avalara configuration page.
You need to define a stock managed item as a purchased and/or a manufactured item. On the Item-site page, you can define replenishment rules based on the item type and the replenishment method.

content_parts.content: You can create a credit memo from the purchase invoice.

content_parts.content: A cost variance between a purchase receipt and credit memo and a production receipt and closure of a work order is recorded in stock as a stock value correction. For the stock journal, the variance is recorded as an absorbed or non-absorbed amount depending on the remaining receipted quantity.
Use the MRP calculation justification page to view data from an MRP calculation request that supports the suggestions generated in the MRP calculation result page.

Use the Stock count creation page to select stock to count and to create a list of the selected stock items.

Use the Stock count page to enter the observed physical quantities of stock.

Note: Stock is not adjusted to reflect any variances. This will be available in a future release.

content_parts.content: Item-site records are locked during a stock count to prevent changes to the available stock. When the count is complete or the item-site record is excluded from the stock count, the locks are removed and you can issue and receive stock again.
